                 English
---------------------------------------------
Follow the instructions:

1. Download this torrent

2. unzip the file using WinRAR

3. Then you need a program to running the .Iso file (width DAEMON Tools)

4. Open "The_Sims_3_StartDisk in DAEMON Tools

5. After that you open/run "The_Sims_3_StartDisk" file,
   it pops up an auto running start that..
   start it, also follow the Installation manual

6. you need a serial code. The Key gen is in the "Crack" folder.
   The file's name is: "serial.exe"

7. then continue to follow the instructions.

   You notice soon that there will be a message that you switch CDs.
   Go to DAEMON Tools and disconnect "The_Sims_3_StartDisk" available where afther
   start "The_Sims_3_Disk_1" (in DAEMON Tools)

8. After the installations are done, go to "Crack" folder, copy "TS3.exe"
   Go to "C:Program FilesElectronic ArtsThe Sims 3GameBin"
   
   There, enter "TS3.exe" file (Copy and Replace)


So shy on:

1. Go on the desktop and start The Sims 3 shortcut. If you do not have the shortcut,
   Go to "C:Program FilesElectronic ArtsThe Sims 3GameBin"
   And start the "TS3.exe" file

!!!!!!!!!!!!! IMPORTANT !!!!!!!!!!!!!

Do not install any new patches/versions/updates then the game will not work
